results.name: Self-inverse permutation of nonnegative integers: a(n) = A263273(8*n)/8.
comment: Note that n=13 is the first point where this involution does not preserve the parity as a(13) = 26.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..7381
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
